title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.1 - Personal service paid from federal moneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.1 - Personal service paid from federal moneys

State Regulations

Expenditures for additional personal service, payable from

Federal moneys granted or allocated as part of the expense of administering a

Federal aid law or act of Congress must be made in accordance with schedules
approved by the Director of the Budget. (State Finance Law, section
108). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
